metadata.title: CVE-2023-42295 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: An issue in OpenImageIO oiio v.2.4.12.0 allows a remote attacker to executearbitrary code and cause a denial of service via the read_rle_imagefunction of file bifs/unquantize.c

criterions.comment: openimageio: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
